DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test effectiveness video-based parent education intervention deliver primary care set parent caregiver discipline attitude practice .
DOC.criteria: Adult caregiver child age 12 36 month schedule wellchild visit . Caregivers must older 18 year age , must consider consistent caregiver child , must primary caregiver least 2 day per week , must live child . Caregivers previously enrol study . Caregivers speak read English , Caregivers able give contact information followup , Caregivers child severe behavioral problem developmental delay report parent initial recruitment phone call .
